archimate:Product.name: Morpheus (older CAPS)
archimate:Product.documentation: Morpheus extends Apache Sparkâ„¢ with Cypher, the industry's most widely used property graph query language defined and maintained by the openCypher project. It allows for the integration of many data sources and supports multiple graph querying. It enables you to use your Spark cluster to run analytical graph queries. Queries can also return graphs to create processing pipelines.
